pullRequest.title: BUGFIX: Filtered deck early due calculation
pullRequest.bodyText:
Pull Request template
Purpose / Description
A user noted that there was a discrepancy between Anki Desktop and AnkiDroid filtered deck calculations.
Fixes
Fixes #6899
Approach
Use double division rather than int division
How Has This Been Tested?
Via pre-existing unit tests
Learning
We need to go through the test failures and determine the issues involved.
Checklist

 You have not changed whitespace unnecessarily (it makes diffs hard to read)
 You have a descriptive commit message with a short title (first line, max 50 chars).
 Your code follows the style of the project (e.g. never omit braces in if statements)
 You have commented your code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
 You have performed a self-review of your own code

commit.message:
BUGFIX: Filtered deck early due calculation

Use double calculation rather than int

Fixes 6899

nodes.bodyText: gosh...I wonder what we should do...hmmm 😅
@Arthur-Milchior this will collide with #6928 which was otherwise good to go but I want to merge a bugfix with priority
